channel.title: Software Testing on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software Testing on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog

item.title: Stumbled on Chrome Net Internal
item.description: Sometime i would use my blog as a place to keep interesting stuff for future exploration. I came across the chrome net internals today and i think it exposes a lot of useful information that might be useful to testers when testing a web application. To access the chrome net internals, navigate to chrome://net-internals/ on a google chrome browser. I would be spending some more time in the future exploring this but for now its back to work.
